text: This place should be shut down.  Horrible quality and service.  The cinnabons were completely raw and the breadsticks were hard and over cooked.  When I called back to tell them about this, I had to wait on hold 10 minutes and then they offered to credit me for the cinnabons on our next call.  What???  So I have to pay for raw food?
